abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds. If Dehaka is stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 47 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

heroics.name: Isolation
heroics.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Adaptation
heroics.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

original.name: Dehaka
original.title: Primal Pack Leader
original.description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.
original.shortDescription: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.

baseHeroInfo.name: Dehaka
baseHeroInfo.title: Primal Pack Leader
baseHeroInfo.description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser with a strong, global presence that can effectively clear groups of minions.

trait.name: Essence Collection
trait.description: Killing an enemy Hero will grant 10 Essence and Minion kills grant 2 Essence. Each Essence consumed heals 29 health over 5 seconds. A maximum of 50 Essence can be stored. Can be cast while channeling.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground. Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

skins.name: Primal Pack Leader
skins.description: Cunning and wise, Dehaka is one of the last surviving pack leaders of the forgotten world of Zerus. As with all primal zerg, he is driven by a powerful desire to consume the essence of his foes and evolve into newer and more deadly forms.

skins.name: Pack Leader Dehaka
skins.description: To the primal zerg, form and function are one. With each change comes greater strength, and thus survival. Few have undergone as much change as Dehakaâ€¦ and he intends to keep it that way.

skins.name: Mecha Dehaka
skins.description: Zerus-class mech D3-H4K4 was developed to gather Kaijo DNA mid-combat. Troublingly, the onboard AI has begun rejecting orders, extracting "essence" from its own targets.
